channel.title: CVE Feed for Kaspersky -- TightVNC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kaspersky -- TightVNC

item.title: CVE-2019-15678|2024-08-05T00:56:22.434Z -- kaspersky -- tightvnc
item.description: TightVNC code version 1.3.10 contains heap buffer overflow in rfbServerCutText handler, which can potentially result code execution.. This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity.

item.title: CVE-2019-15679|2024-08-05T00:56:22.416Z -- kaspersky -- tightvnc
item.description: TightVNC code version 1.3.10 contains heap buffer overflow in InitialiseRFBConnection function, which can potentially result code execution. This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity.

item.title: CVE-2019-15680|2024-08-05T00:56:22.088Z -- kaspersky -- tightvnc
item.description: TightVNC code version 1.3.10 contains null pointer dereference in HandleZlibBPP function, which results Denial of System (DoS). This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity.
